On May 30th 2023, Convergences organised the first online 3Zero Syria Forum, with the aim of ensuring sustainable and inclusive agriculture with improved resources management in Syria. This meeting of stakeholders involved in this sector brought together around 100 participants.

The 3Zero Syria Forum provided a platform for reflection, mobilisation and advocacy between all stakeholders involved in sustainable water management, access to sanitation and sustainable and inclusive agriculture in Syria.

The Forum was structured around sessions in a variety of dynamic formats to enable participants to work together to identify concrete solutions for achieving the global objective, and to highlight the main results and recommendations to be incorporated into public policy in the region and at national level.

This meeting of stakeholders involved in this sector brought together around 100 participants. The 3Zero Syria Forum provided a platform for reflection, mobilisation and advocacy between all stakeholders […]
